contentList.content: You are an able physician, allowing you to mend wounds quickly and get your allies back in the fight. Gain the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Healer_Heal">Seal Wounds</LSTag> to restore injured ally's <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit point</LSTag>.

Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> by 1 up to a maximum of 20. You also gain a +5 bonus to passive Perception and Investigation <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.

Inspire your companions, shoring up their resolve to fight. Grant a number of nearby allies <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> equal to your level plus Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.
You can mend an ally's would quickly and get them back in the fight, restoring [1] <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit point</LSTag>.
Inspire your companions, shoring up their resolve to fight. Grant a number of nearby allies [1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag>.
%%% Technical passive to block Inspiring Leader until short rest.

Affected entity has been fortified by courageous words, granting it <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag>. Can't gain temporary hit points this way again until it has finished a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.

After making an attack on your turn, you can try to shove a nearby creature with your shield as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag>. You gain a +2 bonus to Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> while wielding a shield. If a spell forces you to make a Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, you can use a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">reaction</LSTag> to shield yourself and diminish the effect's damage. On a failed Saving Throw, you only take half damage. On a successful Saving Throw, you don't take any damage.
